resources.string: Thola izici ezengeziwe futhi usekele unjiniyela.
Ngaphansi kwaziphi izimo lolu hlelo lokusebenza luqapha idatha ye-Bluetooth.
Ibonisa isaziso esengeziwe lapho idivayisi ixhunyiwe. Lokhu kukuvumela ukuthi ufihle isaziso esihlala njalo esithi \"Awekho amadivayisi\" ngokukhubaza isiteshi \"Isimo sedivayisi\".
Ingabe isithwebuli sedatha ye-Bluetooth Low Energy kufanele sibeke phambili ukusebenza noma ukonga amandla?
Misa kancane umsindo lapho ukhipha idivayisi endlebeni yakho.
Bonisa amadivayisi abanye abantu aseduze nawe.
Qala ukudlala umsindo lapho idivayisi igqokiwe.
Bonisa idatha mbumbulu, okungukuthi, lingisa amadivayisi angekho.
Izilungiselelo ezengeziwe zokusiza ukuxazulula izinkinga ngohlelo lokusebenza.
Izinga elincane lesignali okufanele idivayisi ibe nalo ukuze ibhekwe njengeyakho.
Uma i-Android ingaxhumeki ngokuzenzakalela, singayicela nayo. Lokhu kuzosetha isethingi yemodi yokuqapha ibe \'Njalo\'.
Kufanele sizame nini ukuxhuma kudivayisi yakho?
Unganikezi uhlelo ukuhlunga idatha, esikhundleni salokho thola yonke idatha bese uhlunga ngaphakathi kohlelo lokusebenza.
Ungavumeli uhlelo ukuthi luhlanganise idatha ye-BLE eqoqiwe ngaphambi kokuyidlulisela kithi.
Ikheli ledivayisi yakho ebhanqiwe. Uhlelo lokusebenza lusebenzisa lokhu ukunquma ukuthi ixhunywe nini kufoni yakho.
Imodeli yedivayisi yakho eyinhloko. Lokhu kusiza uhlelo lokusebenza ukubona idivayisi yakho lapho ingaxhunyiwe kufoni yakho.
Ukhiye Wokuxazulula Ubunikazi (IRK) wedivayisi yakho, osiza i-CAPod ukuyikhomba phakathi kwamadivayisi aseduze.
Ama-AirPods avame ukushintsha ikheli lawo le-Bluetooth ngenxa yobumfihlo. I-IRK isiza i-CAPod ukubona idivayisi yakho. Udinga ukufinyelela kanye ku-MacBook.
Ukhiye wokubethela wedivayisi yakho, ovumela i-CAPod ukuthola ulwazi oluningiliziwe lwesimo.
Ama-AirPods athumela umlayezo wesimo, ingxenye yawo ebhalwe ngemfihlo. Ukhiye wokubethela uvumela i-CAPod ukuthi ikhiphe imfihlo kumlayezo ogcwele. Udinga ukufinyelela kanye ku-MacBook.
Ukugqoka womabili ama-pod akudingekile, ukugqoka i-pod eyodwa kwanele ukuqala ukusabela.
Bonisa isigelekeqe lapho ikesi ledivayisi livulwa (okuyisivivinyo).
Bonisa isigelekeqe lapho idivayisi ixhuma okokuqala.
Rekhoda konke okwenziwa uhlelo lokusebenza kufayela lombhalo ongabelana ngalo.
Ifayela elakhiwe liqukethe ulwazi olubucayi (isb. imininingwane yedivayisi ye-Bluetooth). Yabelana ngalo kuphela namaqembu athembekile.

Lesi sici sirekhoda konke okwenziwa uhlelo lokusebenza kufayela elingabelanwa. Ifayela elakhiwe liqukethe ulwazi olubucayi (isb. imininingwane yedivayisi ye-Bluetooth). Yabelana ngalo kuphela namaqembu athembekile (isb. unjiniyela oxazulula inkinga).
Imibiko yamaphutha ezenzakalelayo ayaziwa. Yabelana nge-ID yakho yokufaka uma unjiniyela edinga ukuthola imibiko yakho yamaphutha.
Isilandeleli senkinga somphakathi semibiko yeziphazamisi nezicelo zezici (isiNgisi kuphela).
Ukulungiswa okujwayelekile okuthinta lonke uhlelo lokusebenza.
Ibika ngokuzenzakalela izinkinga, isb. imininingwane ngokuphahlazeka kohlelo lokusebenza ukuze ngikwazi ukuthola ukuthi ngingakulungisa kanjani.
Susa noma yiziphi izihlungi kusithwebuli se-BLE ukuze ubonise yonke idatha ye-BLE esakazwayo. Iwusizo ukwengeza ukusekelwa kwezinhlobo ezintsha zamahedfoni.
Khubaza ukuthuthukiswa ukuze uthuthukise ukuhambisana. Zama lokhu uma ungaboni noma iyiphi idatha.
Siza ukuhumusha lolu hlelo lokusebenza olimini lwakho oluthandayo.
Iwindi elibonisa isimo sakamuva esaziwayo sedivayisi.
Sebenzisa enye indlela yokwamukela idatha ye-BLE ohlelweni (ukusakaza esikhundleni sokubuyisela ucingo).

Ama-AirPods (namahedfoni afanayo) asakaza ulwazi lwesimo esebenzisa ubuchwepheshe be-BLE obubizwa ngokuthi \"izikhangiso\". Amanye amafoni awalusebenzisi kahle lobu buchwepheshe. I-CAPod ingazama ukukulungisa lokhu ngokuzama izinketho ezahlukene zokuhambisana kuze kutholakale idatha. Qala ukudlala umculo kumahedfoni akho bese uwabeka eduze kwefoni yakho, bese uqala inqubo.
Ukuxazulula izinkinga kwehlulekile. Ayikho inhlanganisela yezinketho zokuhambisana esizile.

Ifoni yakho ayitholanga noma iyiphi idatha ye-BLE nhlobo. Ungaphinda uzame lokhu kuhlolwa endaweni enabantu abaningi ukuze ubone ukuthi imithombo yedatha (ngaphandle kwamahedfoni akho) ingamukelwa yini. Ukungatholakali kwedatha kukhomba inkinga ngohlelo lokusebenza lwefoni yakho.
Ifoni yakho ithole idatha ye-BLE, kodwa idatha ayiveli kunoma iyiphi idivayisi esekelwayo. Ingabe amahedfoni akho avuliwe? Ingabe i-CAPod iyayisekela ihedfoni yakho?
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza lwengeza ukusekelwa kwezici ezithile ze-AirPod ku-Android.
Akuwona wonke amadivayisi e-Android asekela ngokugcwele izici ezengeziwe ze-AirPod. Uhlelo lwakho lokusebenza ludinga ukusebenza kwe-Bluetooth-Low-Energy okusebenza kahle.
I-CAPod ayinazo izikhangiso futhi ayiqoqi idatha yakho.
Ungathuthukela ku-CAPod Pro ukuze uthole izici ezengeziwe futhi usekele ukuthuthukiswa.
Wonke amadivayisi atholiwe mancane amathuba okuthi awakho. Vula futhi uxhume idivayisi yakho noma ulungise izilungiselelo.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume ethi \"Ukuxhuma kwe-Bluetooth\" ukuze lusebenzisane namadivayisi abhanqiwe futhi luqale ukuxhumana.
Imvume \"Ukuskena kwe-Bluetooth\" ivumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ukuthola nokwamukela idatha ye-Bluetooth kumadivayisi aseduze njengama-AirPods akho.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume ye-\"Bluetooth\" ukuze luxhumeke kumadivayisi e-bluetooth abhanqiwe.

I-CAPod isebenzisa imvume \"yendawo eqondile\" ukuze yamukele idatha ye-Bluetooth Low Energy. Amahedfoni akho asebenzisa ubuchwepheshe be-Bluetooth Low Energy ukusakaza isimo sawo. Lolu hlelo lokusebenza NGEKE lusebenzise idatha ye-Bluetooth ukunquma indawo yakho.

I-CAPod isebenzisa \"ukufinyelela indawo engemuva\" ukuze inike amandla izici ezifana ne-\"Bonisa isigelekeqe\" kanye ne-\"AutoConnect\" ngenkathi uhlelo lokusebenza luvaliwe. Ukufinyelela indawo engemuva kuvumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukwamukela idatha ye-Bluetooth Low Energy ngenkathi lusengemuva. Lolu hlelo lokusebenza NGEKE lusebenzise idatha ye-Bluetooth ukunquma indawo yakho.
Ukuthuthukiswa kwebhethri kuvimbela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ekwamukeleni idatha ye-Bluetooth ngokuthembekile ngenkathi uhlelo lokusebenza lusengemuva.
Vumela i-CAPod ukuthi idwebe ngaphezu kwezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza ukuze kwenzeke isici esithi \"Bonisa i-PopUp\".
Lena idivayisi engaziwa, kodwa isebenzisa ifomethi yomlayezo efanayo. Ake sengeze ukusekelwa kwayo, xhumana nami :)
Vumela i-CAPod ukuthi ibonise izaziso mayelana nama-AirPods akho, isb. isimo sawo samanje ngenkathi exhunyiwe.
